Expression: ('[ProductCode]'='FPD170') AND ([SelectedItem]{CH/FPD/ORIFICE/DESIGN} IN ('L1','C1','C2','C3')) AND ([Beta] IS NOT NULL) AND ([Beta] < 0.1)
ShortName: Beta value must be >= 0.1 - Consider using a lower DP to achieve a larger Beta or consider using a larger line size.

Expression: ('[ProductCode]'='FPD170') AND ([SelectedItem]{CH/FPD/ORIFICE/DESIGN}='L1') AND ([Beta] IS NOT NULL) AND ([Beta] > 0.316)
ShortName: Beta must be <= 0.316 - Consider reducing Beta by accepting a higher DP or consider using a smaller line size. Please check the acceptability of the overall pressure loss.

Expression: ('[ProductCode]'='FPD170') AND ([SelectedItem]{CH/FPD/ORIFICE/DESIGN} IN ('C1','C2','C3')) AND ([Beta] IS NOT NULL) AND ([Beta] > 0.75)
ShortName: Beta must be <= 0.75 - Consider reducing Beta by accepting a higher DP or consider using a smaller line size. Please check the acceptability of the overall pressure loss.

Expression: ('[ProductCode]'='FPD170') AND ([SelectedItem]{CH/FPD/ORIFICE/DESIGN} IN ('E1','E2','E3','S2')) AND ([Beta] IS NOT NULL) AND ([Beta] < 0.46)
ShortName: Beta value must be >= 0.46 - Consider using a lower DP to achieve a larger Beta or consider using a larger line size.

Expression: ('[ProductCode]'='FPD170') AND ([SelectedItem]{CH/FPD/ORIFICE/DESIGN} IN ('E1','E2','E3','S2')) AND ([Beta] IS NOT NULL) AND ([Beta] > 0.84)
ShortName: Beta must be <= 0.84 - Consider reducing Beta by accepting a higher DP or consider using a smaller line size. Please check the acceptability of the overall pressure loss.

Expression: ('[ProductCode]'='FPD170') AND ([SelectedItem]{CH/FPD/ORIFICE/DESIGN} IN ('U1','U2')) AND ([Beta] IS NOT NULL) AND ([Beta] < 0.245)
ShortName: Beta value must be >= 0.245 - Consider using a lower DP to achieve a larger Beta or consider using a larger line size.

Expression: ('[ProductCode]'='FPD170') AND ([SelectedItem]{CH/FPD/ORIFICE/DESIGN} IN ('U1','U2')) AND ([Beta] IS NOT NULL) AND ([Beta] > 0.6)
ShortName: Beta must be <= 0.6 - Consider reducing Beta by accepting a higher DP or consider using a smaller line size. Please check the acceptability of the overall pressure loss.

Notes: FPD170: Beta/Reynolds @ meter max/Design (concentric:corner or D D/2)  minimum B<56
Expression: ('[ProductCode]'='FPD170') AND ([SelectedItem]{CH/FPD/ORIFICE/DESIGN} IN ('C1','C3')) AND ([Beta] IS NOT NULL) AND ([ReynoldsNoAtMeterMax] IS NOT NULL) AND ([Beta] <= 0.56) AND ([ReynoldsNoAtMeterMax] < 5000)
ShortName: For Concentric plates with corner or (D + D/2) taps with Beta <= 0.56, Reynolds number must be >= 5000 - Reynolds number is less than the minimum limit for this product, please check the accuracy of the input data or consider decreasing the line size.

Notes: FPD170: Beta/Reynolds @ meter max/Design (concentric:corner or D D/2) minimum B>56
Expression: ('[ProductCode]'='FPD170') AND ([SelectedItem]{CH/FPD/ORIFICE/DESIGN} IN ('C1','C3')) AND ([Beta] IS NOT NULL) AND ([ReynoldsNoAtMeterMax] IS NOT NULL) AND ([Beta] > 0.56) AND ([ReynoldsNoAtMeterMax] < 16000 * [Beta] * [Beta])
ShortName: For Concentric plates with corner or (D + D/2) taps with Beta > 0.56, Reynolds number must be <= 16000*Beta² - Reynolds number is greater than the maximum limit for this product, please check the accuracy of the input data or consider increasing the line size.

Expression: ('[ProductCode]'='FPD170') AND ([SelectedItem]{CH/FPD/ORIFICE/DESIGN}='C2') AND ([ReynoldsNoAtMeterMax] IS NOT NULL) AND ([ReynoldsNoAtMeterMax] < 5000)
ShortName: For Concentric plates with flange taps, Reynolds number must be >= 5000 -  Reynolds number is less than the minimum limit for this product, please check the accuracy of the input data or consider decreasing the line size.

Expression: ('[ProductCode]'='FPD170') AND ([SelectedItem]{CH/FPD/ORIFICE/DESIGN}='C2') AND ([Beta] IS NOT NULL) AND ([ReynoldsNoAtMeterMax] IS NOT NULL) AND ([ReynoldsNoAtMeterMax] < 170 * [Beta] * [Beta] * [PipeID]{length,PipeIDUnits} * 1000)
ShortName: For Concentric plates with flange taps, Reynolds number must be >= 170 * Beta² * PipeID (in mm) - Reynolds number is less than the minimum limit for this product, please check the accuracy of the input data or consider decreasing the line size.

Notes: FPD170: Beta/Reynolds @ meter max/Design (segmental, eccentric) minimum
Expression: ('[ProductCode]'='FPD170') AND ([SelectedItem]{CH/FPD/ORIFICE/DESIGN} IN ('S2','E1','E2','E3')) AND ([Beta] IS NOT NULL) AND ([ReynoldsNoAtMeterMax] IS NOT NULL) AND ([ReynoldsNoAtMeterMax] < (200000 * [Beta] * [Beta]))
ShortName: For Segmental & Eccentric plates, Reynolds number must be >= 200000 * Beta² - Reynolds number is less than the minimum limit for this product, please check the accuracy of the input data or consider decreasing the line size.

Notes: FPD170: Beta/Reynolds @ meter max/Design (segmental, eccentric) maximum
Expression: ('[ProductCode]'='FPD170') AND ([SelectedItem]{CH/FPD/ORIFICE/DESIGN} IN ('S2','E1','E2','E3')) AND ([Beta] IS NOT NULL) AND ([ReynoldsNoAtMeterMax] IS NOT NULL) AND ([ReynoldsNoAtMeterMax] > (1000000 * [Beta]))
ShortName: For Segmental & Eccentric plates, Reynolds number must be <= 1000000 * Beta - Reynolds number is greater than the maximum limit for this product, please check the accuracy of the input data or consider increasing the line size.

Notes: FPD170: Beta/Reynolds @ meter max/Design (quarter circle) maximum
Expression: ('[ProductCode]'='FPD170') AND ([SelectedItem]{CH/FPD/ORIFICE/DESIGN} IN ('U1','U2')) AND ([Beta] IS NOT NULL) AND ([ReynoldsNoAtMeterMax] IS NOT NULL) AND ([ReynoldsNoAtMeterMax] > (100000 * [Beta]))
ShortName: For Quarter Circle plates, Reynolds number must be < 100000*Beta- Reynolds number is greater than the maximum limit for this product, please check the accuracy of the input data or consider increasing the line size.

Notes: FPD170: Beta/Reynolds @ meter max/Design (quarter circle) minimum
Expression: ('[ProductCode]'='FPD170') AND ([SelectedItem]{CH/FPD/ORIFICE/DESIGN} IN ('U1','U2')) AND ([Beta] IS NOT NULL) AND ([ReynoldsNoAtMeterMax] IS NOT NULL) AND ([ReynoldsNoAtMeterMax] < ((1000 * [Beta]) + (9400000 * ([Beta] - 0.24)*([Beta] - 0.24)*([Beta] - 0.24)*([Beta] - 0.24)*([Beta] - 0.24)*([Beta] - 0.24)*([Beta] - 0.24)*([Beta] - 0.24))))
ShortName: For Quarter Circle plates, Reynolds number must be >= 1000*Beta + 9.4E6*(Beta-0.24)^8 - Reynolds number is less than the minimum limit for this product, please check the accuracy of the input data or consider decreasing the line size.

Expression: ('[ProductCode]'='FPD170') AND ([SelectedItem]{CH/FPD/ORIFICE/DESIGN}='L1') AND ([ReynoldsNoAtMeterMax] IS NOT NULL) AND ([ReynoldsNoAtMeterMax] < 80)
ShortName: For Conical Entrance plates, Reynolds number must be >80 - Reynolds number is less than the minimum limit for this product, please check the accuracy of the input data or consider decreasing the line size.

Expression: ('[ProductCode]'='FPD170') AND ([SelectedItem]{CH/FPD/ORIFICE/DESIGN}='L1') AND ([Beta] IS NOT NULL) AND ([ReynoldsNoAtMeterMax] IS NOT NULL) AND ([ReynoldsNoAtMeterMax] > (200000 * [Beta]))
ShortName: For Conical Entrance plates, Reynolds number must be <200000 * Beta - Reynolds number is greater than the maximum limit for this product, please check the accuracy of the input data or consider increasing the line size.

Notes: FPD170: Beta/Reynolds @ normal/Design (concentric:corner or D D/2)  minimum B<56
Expression: ('[ProductCode]'='FPD170') AND ([SelectedItem]{CH/FPD/ORIFICE/DESIGN} IN ('C1','C3')) AND ([Beta] IS NOT NULL) AND ([ReynoldsNoAtNormal] IS NOT NULL) AND ([Beta] <= 0.56) AND ([ReynoldsNoAtNormal] < 5000)
ShortName: For Concentric plates with corner or (D + D/2) taps with Beta <= 0.56, Reynolds number (@ normal flow) must be >= 5000 - Reynolds number is less than the minimum limit for this product, please check the accuracy of the input data or consider decreasing the line size.

Expression: ('[ProductCode]'='FPD170') AND ([SelectedItem]{CH/FPD/ORIFICE/DESIGN}='C2') AND ([ReynoldsNoAtNormal] IS NOT NULL) AND ([ReynoldsNoAtNormal] < 5000)
ShortName: For Concentric plates with Flange taps, Reynolds number (@ normal flow) must be >= 5000 - Reynolds number is less than the minimum limit for this product, please check the accuracy of the input data or consider decreasing the line size.

Expression: ('[ProductCode]'='FPD170') AND ([SelectedItem]{CH/FPD/ORIFICE/DESIGN}='C2') AND ([Beta] IS NOT NULL) AND ([ReynoldsNoAtNormal] IS NOT NULL) AND ([ReynoldsNoAtNormal] < 170 * [Beta] * [Beta] * [PipeID]{length,PipeIDUnits} * 1000)
ShortName: For Concentric plates with Flange taps, Reynolds number (@ normal flow) must be >= 170 * Beta² * PipeID (in mm)

Expression: ('[ProductCode]'='FPD170') AND ([SelectedItem]{CH/FPD/ORIFICE/DESIGN} IN ('S2','E1','E2','E3')) AND ([Beta] IS NOT NULL) AND ([ReynoldsNoAtNormal] IS NOT NULL) AND ([ReynoldsNoAtNormal] < (200000 * [Beta] * [Beta]))
ShortName: For Segmental & Eccentric plates, Reynolds number (@ normal flow) must be >= 200000 * Beta² - Reynolds number is less than the minimum limit for this product, please check the accuracy of the input data or consider decreasing the line size.

Expression: ('[ProductCode]'='FPD170') AND ([SelectedItem]{CH/FPD/ORIFICE/DESIGN} IN ('S2','E1','E2','E3')) AND ([Beta] IS NOT NULL) AND ([ReynoldsNoAtNormal] IS NOT NULL) AND ([ReynoldsNoAtNormal] > (1000000 * [Beta]))
ShortName: For Segmental & Eccentric plates, Reynolds number (@ normal flow) must be <= 1000000 * Beta - Reynolds number is greater than the maximum limit for this product, please check the accuracy of the input data or consider increasing the line size.

Expression: ('[ProductCode]'='FPD170') AND ([SelectedItem]{CH/FPD/ORIFICE/DESIGN} IN ('U1','U2')) AND ([Beta] IS NOT NULL) AND ([ReynoldsNoAtNormal] IS NOT NULL) AND ([ReynoldsNoAtNormal] < ((1000 * [Beta]) + (9400000 * ([Beta] - 0.24)*([Beta] - 0.24)*([Beta] - 0.24)*([Beta] - 0.24)*([Beta] - 0.24)*([Beta] - 0.24)*([Beta] - 0.24)*([Beta] - 0.24))))
ShortName: For Quarter Circle plates, Reynolds number (@ normal flow) must be >= 1000*Beta + 9.4E6*(Beta-0.24)^8 - Reynolds number is less than the minimum limit for this product, please check the accuracy of the input data or consider decreasing the line size.

Expression: ('[ProductCode]'='FPD170') AND ([SelectedItem]{CH/FPD/ORIFICE/DESIGN}='L1') AND ([ReynoldsNoAtNormal] IS NOT NULL) AND ([ReynoldsNoAtNormal] < 80)
ShortName: For Conical Entrance plates, Reynolds number (@ normal flow) must be >80 - Reynolds number is less than the minimum limit for this product, please check the accuracy of the input data or consider decreasing the line size.

Expression: ('[ProductCode]'='FPD170') AND ([ReynoldsNoAtNormal] IS NULL)
ShortName: No normal flow provided; so Reynolds number for meter max flow used in checks.

Notes: FPD170: Small bore and Design = L1
Expression: ('[ProductCode]'='FPD170') AND ([SelectedItem]{CH/FPD/ORIFICE/DES}='L1') AND ([MachinedBore]{Length,PipeIDUnits} is not null) AND ([MachinedBore]{Length,PipeIDUnits} <= 0.006)
ShortName: For Conical Entrance plates, machined bore must be greater than 6 mm.

Notes: FPD170: Small bore and Design = C1, C2, C3
Expression: ('[ProductCode]'='FPD170') AND ([SelectedItem]{CH/FPD/ORIFICE/DES} IN ('C1', 'C2', 'C3')) AND ([MachinedBore]{Length,PipeIDUnits} is not null) AND ([MachinedBore]{Length,PipeIDUnits} <= 0.0125)
ShortName: For Concentric plates, machined bore must be greater than 12.5 mm.

Notes: FPD170: Small bore and Design = U1, U2
Expression: ('[ProductCode]'='FPD170') AND ([SelectedItem]{CH/FPD/ORIFICE/DES} IN ('U1', 'U2')) AND ([MachinedBore]{Length,PipeIDUnits} is not null) AND ([MachinedBore]{Length,PipeIDUnits} <= 0.015)
ShortName: For Quarter Circle plates, machined bore must be greater than 15 mm.

Notes: FPD170: Small bore and Design = E1, E2, E3
Expression: ('[ProductCode]'='FPD170') AND ([SelectedItem]{CH/FPD/ORIFICE/DES} IN ('E1', 'E2', 'E3')) AND ([MachinedBore]{Length,PipeIDUnits} is not null) AND ([MachinedBore]{Length,PipeIDUnits} <= 0.05)
ShortName: For Eccentric plates, machined bore must be greater than 50 mm.

Notes: FPD170: Small bore and Design = S2
Expression: ('[ProductCode]'='FPD170') AND ([SelectedItem]{CH/FPD/ORIFICE/DES} = 'S2') AND ([MachinedBore]{Length,PipeIDUnits} is not null) AND ([MachinedBore]{Length,PipeIDUnits} <= 0.05)
ShortName: For Segmental plates, machined bore must be greater than 50 mm.

Expression: ('[ProductCode]'='FPD170') AND ([SelectedItem]{CH/FPD/PLATE/THICK,numvalue} < [PlateThicknessMin]{length,LengthOutputUnits})
ShortName: Selected plate thickness is below the mimimum allowable plate thickness for deflection. Please select "Z99" others in the dropdown menu

Expression: ('[ProductCode]'='FPD170') AND ([SelectedItem]{CH/FPD/PLATE/THICK,numvalue} < [QuarterCircleRadius]{length,LengthOutputUnits})
ShortName: Please select a plate thickness greater than the calculated quarter circle radius or select "Z99" Others in the dropdown menu.

Expression: ('[ProductCode]'='FPD170') AND ([SelectedItem]{CH/FPD/PRODUCT/DES} IN ('C1','C2')) AND ([SelectedItem]{CH/FPD/PLATE/THICK} IN ('S01','S02','S04','S06','T1','T2')) AND ([SelectedItem]{CH/FPD/CUST/STD}='A1')
ShortName: Plate thickness is not to the ABB standard - recommend switch to alternative thickness as follows : 3mm (up to 8 in. NB); 6mm (10 to 12 in. NB); 10mm (14 to 20 in. NB) - all subject to compliance with the Minimum Deflection Thickness shown in the calculation.

Expression: ('[ProductCode]'='FPD170') AND ([SelectedItem]{CH/FPD/PRODUCT/DES} IN ('C1','C2')) AND ([SelectedItem]{CH/FPD/PLATE/THICK} IN ('S01','S02','S04','S06','S08','S10','T1')) AND ([SelectedItem]{CH/FPD/CUST/STD}='A2')
ShortName: Plate thickness is not within ARAMCO design standard - recommend switch to alternative thickness.

Notes: FPD170: 1.5mm SHELL not ½, ¾, 1 or 1½in
Expression: ('[ProductCode]'='FPD170') AND ([SelectedItem]{CH/FPD/PRODUCT/DES} IN ('C1','C2')) AND ([SelectedItem]{CH/FPD/PLATE/THICK}='S01') AND ([SelectedItem]{CH/FPD/CUST/STD}='S1') AND NOT([SelectedItem]{CH/FPD/LINE/SIZE} IN ('015','020','025','040'))
ShortName: Line size not compatible with 1.5 mm plate thickness when using Shell design standard.

Expression: ('[ProductCode]'='FPD170') AND ([SelectedItem]{CH/FPD/PRODUCT/DES} IN ('C1','C2')) AND ([SelectedItem]{CH/FPD/PLATE/THICK}='S02') AND ([SelectedItem]{CH/FPD/CUST/STD}='S1') AND NOT([SelectedItem]{CH/FPD/LINE/SIZE} IN ('050'))
ShortName: Line size not compatible with 2 mm plate thickness when using Shell design standard.

Expression: ('[ProductCode]'='FPD170') AND ([SelectedItem]{CH/FPD/PRODUCT/DES} IN ('C1','C2')) AND ([SelectedItem]{CH/FPD/PLATE/THICK}='S03') AND ([SelectedItem]{CH/FPD/CUST/STD}='S1') AND NOT([SelectedItem]{CH/FPD/LINE/SIZE} IN ('080','100'))
ShortName: Line size not compatible with 3 mm plate thickness when using Shell design standard.

Expression: ('[ProductCode]'='FPD170') AND ([SelectedItem]{CH/FPD/PRODUCT/DES} IN ('C1','C2')) AND ([SelectedItem]{CH/FPD/PLATE/THICK}='S03') AND ([SelectedItem]{CH/FPD/CUST/STD}='A2') AND NOT([SelectedItem]{CH/FPD/LINE/SIZE} IN ('050','065','080','090','100','125','150','200'))
ShortName: Line size not compatible with 3 mm plate thickness when using ARAMCO design.

Expression: ('[ProductCode]'='FPD170') AND ([SelectedItem]{CH/FPD/PRODUCT/DES} IN ('C1','C2')) AND ([SelectedItem]{CH/FPD/PLATE/THICK}='S04') AND ([SelectedItem]{CH/FPD/CUST/STD}='S1') AND NOT([SelectedItem]{CH/FPD/LINE/SIZE} IN ('150'))
ShortName: Line size not compatible with 4 mm plate thickness when using Shell design standard.

Expression: ('[ProductCode]'='FPD170') AND ([SelectedItem]{CH/FPD/PRODUCT/DES} IN ('C1','C2')) AND ([SelectedItem]{CH/FPD/PLATE/THICK}='S05') AND ([SelectedItem]{CH/FPD/CUST/STD}='S1') AND NOT([SelectedItem]{CH/FPD/LINE/SIZE} IN ('200','250'))
ShortName: Line size not compatible with 6 mm plate thickness when using Shell design standard.

Expression: ('[ProductCode]'='FPD170') AND ([SelectedItem]{CH/FPD/PRODUCT/DES} IN ('C1','C2')) AND ([SelectedItem]{CH/FPD/PLATE/THICK}='S05') AND ([SelectedItem]{CH/FPD/CUST/STD}='A2') AND NOT([SelectedItem]{CH/FPD/LINE/SIZE} IN ('250','300'))
ShortName: Combination of Line size and Flange Rating is not compatible with 6 mm plate thickness when using ARAMCO design standard.

Expression: ('[ProductCode]'='FPD170') AND ([SelectedItem]{CH/FPD/PRODUCT/DES} IN ('C1','C2')) AND ([SelectedItem]{CH/FPD/PLATE/THICK}='S06') AND ([SelectedItem]{CH/FPD/CUST/STD}='S1') AND NOT([SelectedItem]{CH/FPD/LINE/SIZE} IN ('300'))
ShortName: Line size not compatible with 8 mm plate thickness when using Shell design standard.

Expression: ('[ProductCode]'='FPD170') AND ([SelectedItem]{CH/FPD/PRODUCT/DES} IN ('C1','C2')) AND ([SelectedItem]{CH/FPD/PLATE/THICK}='S07') AND ([SelectedItem]{CH/FPD/CUST/STD}='S1') AND NOT([SelectedItem]{CH/FPD/LINE/SIZE} IN ('350','400'))
ShortName: Line size not compatible with 10 mm plate thickness when using Shell design standard.

Expression: ('[ProductCode]'='FPD170') AND ([SelectedItem]{CH/FPD/PRODUCT/DES} IN ('C1','C2')) AND ([SelectedItem]{CH/FPD/PLATE/THICK}='S07') AND ([SelectedItem]{CH/FPD/CUST/STD}='A2') AND NOT([SelectedItem]{CH/FPD/LINE/SIZE} IN ('400','450','500','600','650'))
ShortName: Line size not compatible with 10 mm plate thickness when using ARAMCO design standard.

Expression: ('[ProductCode]'='FPD170') AND ([SelectedItem]{CH/FPD/PRODUCT/DES} IN ('C1','C2')) AND ([SelectedItem]{CH/FPD/PLATE/THICK}='S08') AND ([SelectedItem]{CH/FPD/CUST/STD}='S1') AND NOT([SelectedItem]{CH/FPD/LINE/SIZE} IN ('450','500'))
ShortName: Line size not compatible with 12 mm plate thickness when using Shell design standard.

Expression: ('[ProductCode]'='FPD170') AND ([SelectedItem]{CH/FPD/PRODUCT/DES} IN ('C1','C2')) AND ([SelectedItem]{CH/FPD/PLATE/THICK} IN ('T1','T2')) AND ([SelectedItem]{CH/FPD/CUST/STD}='S1')
ShortName: Plate thickness is not within Shell design standard - recommend switch to alternative thickness.

Expression: ('[ProductCode]'='FPD170') AND ([SelectedItem]{CH/FPD/PRODUCT/DES} IN ('C1','C2')) AND ([SelectedItem]{CH/FPD/PLATE/THICK}='T1') AND ([SelectedItem]{CH/FPD/CUST/STD}='A2') AND NOT([SelectedItem]{CH/FPD/LINE/SIZE} IN ('700','750','800','850','900','950'))
ShortName: Line size not compatible with ½ in. plate thickness when using ARAMCO design standard.

Expression: ('[ProductCode]'='FPD170') AND ([SelectedItem]{CH/FPD/PRODUCT/DES} IN ('C1','C2')) AND ([SelectedItem]{CH/FPD/PLATE/THICK}='S10') AND ([SelectedItem]{CH/FPD/CUST/STD}='S1') AND NOT([SelectedItem]{CH/FPD/LINE/SIZE} IN ('600'))
ShortName: Line size not compatible with 16 mm plate thickness when using Shell design standard.

Expression: ('[ProductCode]'='FPD170') AND ([SelectedItem]{CH/FPD/PRODUCT/DES} IN ('C1','C2')) AND ([SelectedItem]{CH/FPD/PLATE/THICK}='T2') AND ([SelectedItem]{CH/FPD/CUST/STD}='A2') AND NOT([SelectedItem]{CH/FPD/LINE/SIZE} IN ('001','051'))
ShortName: Line size not compatible with ¾ in. plate thickness when using ARAMCO design standard.

Expression: ('[ProductCode]'='FPD170') AND ([SelectedItem]{CH/FPD/PRODUCT/DES} IN ('C1','C2')) AND ([SelectedItem]{CH/FPD/CUST/STD}='S1') AND ([SelectedItem]{CH/FPD/LINE/SIZE} IN ('650','700','750','800','850','900','950','001','051'))
ShortName: Line size is not within Shell design standard.

Expression: ('[ProductCode]'='FPD170') AND (COUNT([SelectedItem]{CH/FPD/ADD/REQ}) > 0)
ShortName: Please provide full detail of the added requirement(s) with enquiry/order.

Expression: ('[ProductCode]'='FPD170') AND ([SelectedItem]{CH/FPD/ORIFICE/DESIGN} IN ('C5','C6'))
ShortName: Results for Multi-hole orifice plates are calculated by vendor using the supplied process data. For more information please contact your sales representative.

Notes: FPD170: Drain / Vent other than square edge plates outside scope of selected standard
Expression: ('[ProductCode]'='FPD170') AND ([SelectedItem]{CH/FPD/ORIFICE/DESIGN} IN ('L1','E1','E2','E3','U1','U2','S2')) AND ([SelectedItem]{CH/FPD/DRAIN/VENT} IN ('HT1','HT2'))
ShortName: Drain/Vent holes in Orifice Design L1, E1, E2, E3, U1, U2, S2 are not covered by selected standard.

Notes: FPD170: Drain / Vent outside scope of selected standard AGA3
Expression: ('[ProductCode]'='FPD170') AND ([SelectedItem]{CH/FPD/ORIFICE/DESIGN} IN ('C1','C2','C3','L1','E1','E2','E3','U1','U2','S2')) AND ([SelectedItem]{CH/FPD/DRAIN/VENT} IN ('HT1','HT2')) AND ([SelectedItem]{Calculation Type} = '3')
ShortName: Drain/Vent holes in Orifice Design C1, C2, C3, L1, E1, E2, E3, U1, U2, S2 are not covered by selected standard.

Expression: ('[ProductCode]'='FPD170') AND ([SelectedItem]{CH/FPD/DRAIN/VENT} IN ('HT1','HT2')) AND ([PipeID]{length,PipeIDUnits} <= 0.1)
ShortName: ISO 5167 requires line ID to be => 100 mm for the use of drain or vent hole.

Notes: FPD170: Drain vent <10% of machined bore (custom sizes only)
Expression: ('[ProductCode]'='FPD170') AND ([SelectedItem]{CH/FPD/DRAIN/VENT} IN ('HT1','HT2')) AND ([DrainVentSize]{Length,DrainVentSizeUnits} > 0.1 * [MachinedBore]{Length,LengthOutputUnits})
ShortName: The diameter of the Drain/Vent hole should not exceed 1/10th of bore

Notes: FPD170: Drain vent <10% of machined bore (pre-set sizes only)
Expression: ('[ProductCode]'='FPD170') AND (([SelectedItem]{CH/FPD/DRAIN/VENT} IN ('HT1','HT2')) AND ([SelectedItem]{CH/FPD/DRAIN/VENT/SIZE,numvalue} > 0.1 * [MachinedBore]{Length,LengthOutputUnits}))
ShortName: Drain/Vent cannot be greater than 1/10th of bore.

Expression: ('[ProductCode]'='FPD170') AND ([FluidCategory] <> 2) AND ([SelectedItem]{CH/FPD/TAPPING/ORIENT} = 'TG2')
ShortName: Inclined Up TG2 - Please consider your tapping orientation selection - Inclined up is recommended for all gas applications to ensure condensate drains back into the pipe and does not collect in impulse pipes.

Expression: ('[ProductCode]'='FPD170') AND ([FluidCategory] IN (1, 2)) AND ([SelectedItem]{CH/FPD/TAPPING/ORIENT} = 'TG3')
ShortName: Horizontal TG3 - Please consider your tapping orientation - Recommended for all steam applications.

Expression: ('[ProductCode]'='FPD170') AND ([FluidCategory] <> 1) AND ([SelectedItem]{CH/FPD/TAPPING/ORIENT} = 'TG4')
ShortName: Inclined Down TG4 - Please consider your tapping orientation - Recommended for all liquid applications to ensure gas vents back into the pipe and does not collect in impulse pipes.

Expression: ('[ProductCode]'='FPD170') AND (ISNULL([MinimumFlow],-1)<0)
ShortName: As no minimum flow has been provided turndown checks will not be completed.

Expression: ('[ProductCode]'='FPD170') AND ([MinimumFlow]{flow,MinimumFlowUnits} < 0.25 * [MeterMaxFlow]{flow, MeterMaxFlowUnits})
ShortName: Flow measurement range “Turndown” is greater than 4:1. We recommend that you ensure that any transmitter used with this meter will have sufficient accuracy at your specified Normal and Minimum flowrates.

Expression: ('[ProductCode]'='FPD175') AND ([OperatingTemperature]{temperature,OperatingTemperatureUnits}<253) AND ([FluidCategory]<3)
ShortName: Minimum temperature for OriMaster for gas/liquid is -20°C

Expression: ('[ProductCode]'='FPD175') AND ([OperatingTemperature]{temperature,OperatingTemperatureUnits}>394) AND ([FluidCategory]<3)
ShortName: Upper limit of transmitter temperature range: please check the limits of your transmitter if direct mount; If remote mount, please check that graphite seals are used in manifold if temperature is above 200°C

Expression: ('[ProductCode]'='FPD175') AND ([OperatingTemperature]{temperature,OperatingTemperatureUnits}<253) AND ([FluidCategory]=3) AND ('[FluidName]'='Steam (Saturated)')
ShortName: Minimum temperature for OriMaster for steam is -20°C

Expression: ('[ProductCode]'='FPD175') AND ([OperatingTemperature]{temperature,OperatingTemperatureUnits}>503) AND ([FluidCategory]=3) AND ('[FluidName]'='Steam (Saturated)')
ShortName: Upper limit of transmitter temperature range: please check the limits of your transmitter if direct mount; If remote mount, please check that graphite seals are used in manifold if temperature is above 200°C

Expression: ('[ProductCode]'='FPD175') AND ([OperatingPressure]{pressure,OperatingPressureUnits}>10101300.25)
ShortName: Operating pressure exceeds max. static pressure (100 Bar g)

Expression: ('[ProductCode]'='FPD175') AND (([OperatingPressure]{Pressure,OperatingPressureUnits}-[DPAtMeterMax]{DP,DPUnits})/[OperatingPressure]{Pressure,OperatingPressureUnits}<0.75)
ShortName: Differential pressure too high

Expression: ('[ProductCode]'='FPD175') AND ([DPAtMeterMax]{DP,DPUnits}<2)
ShortName: Differential pressure too low

Expression: ('[ProductCode]'='FPD175') AND ([ReynoldsNo]<5000) AND ([SelectedItem]{CH/FPD175/BETA/RATIO}='B1')
ShortName: Reynolds number too low for Beta=0.4

Expression: ('[ProductCode]'='FPD175') AND ([ReynoldsNo]<(16000*0.65*0.65)) AND ([SelectedItem]{CH/FPD175/BETA/RATIO}='B2')
ShortName: Reynolds number too low for Beta=0.65

Expression: ('[ProductCode]'='FPD175') AND  ([SelectedItem]{CH/FPD175/MODEL/DESIGN}='C7')
ShortName: Final results for multi-hole orifice plates will be calculated on receipt of PO or on request. Only a basic calculation is offered to ensure suitability of the device for the given process conditions. For more information please contact your local sales office.

Expression: ([ReynoldsNoAtMeterMax] is not null) AND ([ReynoldsNoAtMeterMax] > 100000000)
ShortName: Reynolds number is greater than the limit 100,000,000 for any type of differential pressure flow metering. No other type of flow meter in this software package is suitable for such a condition. Please check the accuracy of the input data, consider decreasing the reynolds number by increasing the line size.

Expression: ([DPAtMeterMax]{DP,DPUnits} < 125)
ShortName: Note: DP is low - check transmitter suitable for these conditions.
